node.title: China Mirrors
node.description: Here is how to increase the speed of Debian, Docker, Node, PHP, Python setups, by using mirrors hosted inside China.

node.title: Static site with Hugo and GitHub Pages
node.description: An exploration of Hugo, a static site generator, and how to host the resulting static website on GitHub pages.
